infos.value: The Ardra continent, once of the realm of Lapis. Long have tales of the Crystals centered upon this land, where nations struggled ceaselessly for a chance at supremacy.
Though small and surrounded by more powerful nations, the Kingdom of Leonis maintained its presence, thanks to an ancient ring bestowed upon the kingdom by the Winged One.
The ability to summon and command visions—thoughts and emotions made manifest—was indeed a palpable military threat to the other kingdoms.
Repeated brushes with cruel fate, however, quietly eat away at the bonds that keep the kingdom intact.
Now, upon whom will the resplendent Crystals smile in this land of rivaling warlords?
What of you, Sterne? Not actually enjoying this, are you?
If vanquishing monsters means an opportunity to accompany you to the field, then yes.
There will be time for words later. Foes...bombs are in our midst.
